catalog_script_client.name: Fill request variables - OnSubmit

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_f4ace0eb47b51510b0ce8b42e36d4346
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Service Training">b7f1c31f1b4801d05b1b411acd4bcbca</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Fill request variables - OnSubmit</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
	var request_support_for = g_form.getValue("request_support_for");
	var request_support_for_internal = g_form.getValue("request_support_for_internal");
	var request_type = g_form.getValue("request_type");
	var request_type_internal = g_form.getValue("request_type_internal");

	if (request_support_for_internal !== "" && request_support_for === "") {
		g_form.setValue("request_support_for", request_support_for_internal);
	}
	
	if (request_type_internal !== "" && request_type === "") {
		g_form.setValue("request_type", request_type_internal);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>cocbom0</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-13 15:58:32</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f4ace0eb47b51510b0ce8b42e36d4346</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fill request variables - OnSubmit</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f4ace0eb47b51510b0ce8b42e36d4346</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-07 15:05:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
